name: T11_30s
prompt: Suburban home driveway at midday, viewed from an elevated position on the garage. Same person walking through property. First seen from front, then side profile, then from behind. Consistent clothing and gait throughout. Static elevated viewpoint, clear daytime footage. Real-time speed, natural fluid motion at 1x playback rate.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, artifacts, glitches, distorted, unrealistic motion, multiple camera angles, jump cuts, visible camera, security camera device, doorbell camera, camera lens visible, camera equipment, camera housing, surveillance camera in frame, camera mount, camera on wall, camera on ceiling, camera rig, recording device in shot, gopro, webcam, CCTV camera visible, Ring doorbell visible, Nest camera visible, slow motion, time lapse, fast forward, sped up, slowed down
